T11bsa0552u:4: yat sat tat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti /
T11bsa0552u:5: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayituṃ /
T11bsa0552u:8: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste,
T11bsa0552u:15: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ padārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati;
T11bsa0552u:19: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasidvasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣīkṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa vāsidvasambhāvanāpi
T11bsa0552u:29: sambhave vā tenaiva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasidveralaṃ sattānumāneneti cet /
T11bsa0552u:32: tathā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇe tāvat ekāmarthakriyāṃ karoti /
T11bsa0552u:33: atītānāgatakṣaṇayorapi kiṃ tāme vārthakriyāṃ kuryādanyāṃ vā,
T11bsa0552u:37: yadā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryyaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kāryye śakto 'śakto vā /
T11bsa0552u:38: yadi śaktastadā varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt tatrāpi śaktatvāt śaktasya kṣepāyogāt /
T11bsa0552u:41: athāśaktastadā ekatra kāryye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvvāraprasaraḥ syāt /
T11bsa0552u:43: yadā hi śaktasya svabhāvasya vilambo 'pyasahyastadā dūrītsāritamakaraṇam /
T11bsa0552u:48: tadevamekatra kāryye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedāt ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam /
T11bsa0552u:54: sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ sidvatvāt asidvistāvadasambhavinī /
T11bsa0552u:58: sākṣādajanake 'pi kuśūlādyavasthitavījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet / na /
T11bsa0552u:60: tatra yatpāramārthikam jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:61: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthita vījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvāt aupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte sambhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā /
T11bsa0552u:68: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvvasya sarvvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt /
T11bsa0552u:70: tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivarttamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisidveranavadyo hetuḥ /
T11bsa0552u:71: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryyakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe ca atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyaṃ janayati /
T11bsa0552u:76: tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyaṃ yathā śālyaṅkuramakurvvan kodravaḥ śālyaṅkure /
T11bsa0552u:77: na karoti caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyamiti vyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam /
T11bsa0552u:80: na cānaikāntikatā pūrvvoktena nyāyena samartha vyavahāragocaratvajanakatvayovidhibhūtayoḥ sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
T11bsa0552u:81: yatpunaratroktaṃ yadyadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:88: na cātrapakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryyāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya sādhyāviśiṣṭatvamabhidhātumucitaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:90: kāraṇatvasamarthavyavahāragocaratvayośca bṛkṣaśiṃśapayoriva vyāvṛttibhedo 'stītyanavasara eva evaṃvidhasya kṣudrapralāpasya /
T11bsa0552u:91: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:95: dṛṣṭāntamātra eva prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayābhyāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāt nanvābhyāmeva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirastviti cet /
T11bsa0552u:97: yo hi pratipattā prativastu yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayatītyā dikamupanyasituṃ analasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ
T11bsa0552u:98: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa ttvekatradharmmiṇi yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ
T11bsa0552u:102: samarthetarasvabhāvavirudvadharmmā dhyāsāt bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgatayā sapakṣatāmāvahati
T11bsa0552u:105: atraiva sādharmmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
T11bsa0552u:106: nanu viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalābdyāptisiddhistasya copanyāsavārttāpi nāsti tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ prasādhiteti cet /
T11bsa0552u:109: 'pi ghaṭasya śaktisambhave tadānīmevaitat karaṇamakaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā
T11bsa0552u:110: pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ /
T11bsa0552u:111: nanvevaṃ anvayamātramastu vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyamiti cet,
T11bsa0552u:114: na dvividhā hi vyāptisiddhiranvayarūpā ca karttṛdharmmaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:116: vyatirekarūpā ca karmmadharmmaḥ sādhyābhāve sādhanasyāvaśyamabhāvo yaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:120: yathā viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati vyatireke siddhe anvayaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvvaṃ sthito 'pi paścātparigalati /
T11bsa0552u:122: tathā prasaṅgatadviparyyayahetudvayabalato niyamavatyanvaye siddhe vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvvaṃ sthito 'pi sandehaḥ paścātparigalatyeva /
T11bsa0552u:125: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ tadevaṃ viparyyayabādhakapramāṇamantareṇāpi
T11bsa0552u:134: na ca pūrvvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātāsti kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa0552u:136: na ca pūrbbotarakālayoḥ sambittī tābhyāṃ vāsanā tayā ca hetuphalāvasāyī vikalpa iti yuktaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:137: sa hi vikalpo gṛhītānusandhāyako 'tadrūpasamāropako vā na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:144: tathā hi vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ vījādijñānāt kāryyādaṅkurādervā niścetavyaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:158: tataśca sāmarthyasandehe bhavatītyeva vaktumaśakyaṃ kathamabhūtvābhāvitvaṃ kāryyatvaṃ setsyati /
T11bsa0552u:159: apekṣitaparavyāpāratvaṃ kāryyatvamityapi nāsato dharmmaḥ sattvañca sāmarthyaṃ tacca sandigdhamiti kutaḥ kāryyasiddhiḥ /
T11bsa0552u:160: tadasidvau pūrvvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsidvo hetuḥ /
T11bsa0552u:162: tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvat ajātasyānanvayanirudvasya vā kāryyārambhakatvaṃ sambhavati /
T11bsa0552u:163: na ca nispannasya tāvān kṣaṇo 'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryyāya vyāpāryyet /
T11bsa0552u:168: yadvā, sarvvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye virudvatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti /
T11bsa0552u:175: anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tat pratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam /
T11bsa0552u:177: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravartteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyate /
T11bsa0552u:180: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā virudvaṃ vaktumucitaṃ,
T11bsa0552u:183: tathāhi kāraṇajñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva iti anvayaniścayo janyate,
T11bsa0552u:184: tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbhaṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate /
T11bsa0552u:196: kintu yatra pramāṇapratīte vījādau vastubhūte dharmmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthya tatra kṣaṇābhaṅga sādhanāya /
T11bsa0552u:198: anyathā na kvacidapi vastumātrasyāpi pratipattiḥ syāt /
T11bsa0552u:199: tasmācchāstrīyasattvalakṣaṇasandehe 'pi paṭupratyakṣavalāvalambitavastubhāve aṅkurādau kāryyatvamupalabhyamānaṃ vījādeḥ sāmarthyamupasthāpayatīti nāsidvidoṣāvakāśaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:206: adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanāt vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasidviriti kva virodhaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:207: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve api anyanivṛttī na vastunī svalakṣaṇāvagāhitve abhilāpasaṃsargānupapatteriti cet / na /
T11bsa0552u:218: yathā sarvvasyāsattve 'pi vījādaṅkurasyaivotpattiḥ dṛṣṭasya niyatahetuphalabhāvasya pratikṣeptumaśakyatvāt /
T11bsa0552u:219: paraṃ vāhyenārthena sati pratibandhe prāmāṇyamanyathātvaprāmāṇyamiti viśeṣaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:221: nānākālasyaikasya vastuno vastuto 'sambhavepyatadrūpaparāvṛttayoreva sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇāt /
T11bsa0552u:222: dvividho hi pratyakṣasya viṣayo grāhyo 'dhyavaseyaśca sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt
T11bsa0552u:236: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:238: yadvā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭātmako deśakālāntarabartī atadrūpaparāvṛttaḥ sarvvo viśeṣaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:248: anyathā ghaṭo 'pi ghaṭasantāno 'pi pratyakṣato na sidhyet sarvvātmanā grahaṇābhāvāt /
T11bsa0552u:250: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu /
T11bsa0552u:251: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatve sādhanasya virudvatvaṃ syāt iti na kaścidvirodhaprabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:254: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayavalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyettadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisidveranaikāntikatvaṃ na syāditi yuktam /
T11bsa0552u:256: tathāhi śakto 'pi ghaṭaḥ kramisahakāryyapekṣayā kramikāryyaṃ kariṣyati /
T11bsa0552u:257: na caitad vaktavyaṃ samartho 'rthaḥ svarūpeṇa karoti /
T11bsa0552u:258: svarūpañca sarvvadāstītyanupakāriṇi sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti,
T11bsa0552u:261: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ /
T11bsa0552u:263: tasmādarthaḥ samartho 'pi syāt na ca karotīti sandigdhavyatirekaḥ prasaṅgahetuḥ /
T11bsa0552u:266: tasya ca yādṛśaścaramakṣaṇe 'kṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ tādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi prasahya kurbbāṇo brahmaṇāpyanivāryyaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:267: na ca so 'pyakṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvādbhinna evābhidhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:272: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryyasambhavaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:273: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ karttā syāt yuktametat /
T11bsa0552u:274: kintu sāmagrī janikā tataḥ sahakāryyantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso 'pi na kāryyaprasava iti kimatra virudvaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:275: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇakarotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
T11bsa0552u:280: atrocyate / yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamepāmastu ko niṣedvā?
T11bsa0552u:281: militaireva tu tatkāryya karttavyamiti kuto labhyate?
T11bsa0552u:284: tasmāt sāmagrī janika naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:286: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭādbhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam /
T11bsa0552u:287: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatti rna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryyotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti /
T11bsa0552u:288: na ca pratyabhijñādibalādekatvasidviḥ tat pauruṣasya lūnapunarjātakeśanakhādāvapyupalambhato nirddalanāt,
T11bsa0552u:292: vyāptau tu sākṣātparamparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake 'yogavyavacchedaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:295: tatsvabhāve ca vyāpye 'nyayogavyavacchedo vikalpāruḍharūpāpekṣayā vyāptau dvividhamavadhāraṃam /
T11bsa0552u:296: nanu yadi pūrvvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvvadājanakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāttadāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ saṅgacchate /
T11bsa0552u:297: na kṣaṇabhaṅgavādinā pūrvvāparakālayorekaḥ kaścidupalabdha iti cet /
T11bsa0552u:300: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvvakālabhāvī /
T11bsa0552u:301: pūrvvakālabhāvī vā yo 'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī,
T11bsa0552u:303: tathā ca sati sidvayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope sidvameva jananamajananambāsajyata iti /
T11bsa0552u:306: yasmāt dvividhaṃ sāmarthya nijamāgantukañca sahakāryyantaraṃ tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat
T11bsa0552u:307: sahakārinānātvādapi kramavat kāryyanānātvopapatteraśakyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvamupapādayitumiti cet /
T11bsa0552u:310: tathāpi yat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ arthakriyādharmmakamavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ tat kiṃ prāgapi paścādeva veti vikalpya yaddūṣaṇamugdīritaṃ
T11bsa0552u:312: yattu kāryyeṇaiva sahakāriṇo 'pekṣanta ityupatkṛtaṃ tadapi nirupayogaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:313: yadi hi kāryyameva svajanmani svatantraṃ syādyuktametat /
T11bsa0552u:316: tathā ca sati santo hetavaḥ sarvvathāsamarthāḥ /
T11bsa0552u:318: atha kāryyasyaivāyamaparādho yadidaṃ samarthe kāraṇe satyapi kadācinnopapadyata iti cet /
T11bsa0552u:324: kintu tadabhāvena bhavatyeveti vyatirekaprādhānyāditi cet / na /
T11bsa0552u:325: yadi hi svayambhavan bhāvayedeva hetuḥ svakāryyaṃ tadā tadabhāvaprayukto 'syābhāva iti pratītiḥ syāt /
T11bsa0552u:326: no ced yathā kāraṇe satyapi kāryyasvātantryānna bhavati /
T11bsa0552u:327: tathā tadabhāve 'pi svātantryādeva na bhūtamiti śaṅkā kena nivāryyeta /
T11bsa0552u:331: tasmād yathaiva tadbhāve niyamena na bhavati /
T11bsa0552u:337: yo hṛttarakāryyajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
T11bsa0552u:338: na tarhi tatkāryyakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikamapi karotīti /
T11bsa0552u:339: atrocyate / sthirasvabhāvatve hi bhāvasya uttarakālamevedaṃ kāryyaṃ na pūrvvakālamiti kuta etat /
T11bsa0552u:341: kiṃ kurmmaḥ uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet;
T11bsa0552u:343: sthiṣtvepyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva karotīti cet /
T11bsa0552u:345: dhūmādagnirityatrāpi svabhāva evāsya yadidānīmatra niragnirapi dhūma iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
T11bsa0552u:353: uttarakāryyajananavyavahāragocaratvañca tvadabhyupagamāt prathamakāryyakaraṇakāla eva ghaṭe dharmmiṇi sidvaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:354: atastanmātrānubandhina uttarābhimatasya kāryyasya prathame kṣaṇe 'sambhavādeva prasaṅgaḥ kriyate /
T11bsa0552u:355: na hi nīlakārake 'pi pītakārakatvārope pītasambhavaprasaṅgaḥ svavacanavirodhonāma /
T11bsa0552u:360: tathāhi bījamaṅkurādikaṃ kurvvad yadi yenaiva svabhāvenāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikantadākṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiḥ /
T11bsa0552u:361: nānāsvabhāvatvena tu kārakatve svabhāvānāmanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāritvādekatra bhāvābhāvau parasparavirudvau syātāmityekamapi bījaṃ bhidyeta /
T11bsa0552u:368: tathā bījasyāṅkuraṃ prati kārakatvaṃ garddabhādikaṃ pratyakārakatvamiti kārakatvākārakatve api virudvau dharmau /
T11bsa0552u:370: tadevamekatra bīje pradīpe rūpe ca vipakṣe paridṛśyamānaḥ śaktāśaktatvādirvirudvadharmmādhyāso na ghaṭāderbhedaka iti /
T11bsa0552u:373: svabhāvānāṃ hyanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāre bhedaḥ prāptāvasaro na virodhaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:374: virodhastu yadvidhāne yanniṣedho yanniṣedhe yadvidhānaṃ tayorekatradharmmiṇi parasparaparihārasthitatayā syāt /
T11bsa0552u:375: tadatraikaḥ svbhāvaḥ svābhāvena virudvo yukto bhāvābhāvavat /
T11bsa0552u:381: tadyadi pratiyogitvābhāvādanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāri ṇāvapi svabhāvāvavirudvo tatkārakatvānyākārakatve vā viṣayabhedādavirudve,
T11bsa0552u:385: kevalaṃ yathā tadeva kāryyaṃ prati kvaciddeśe śaktirdeśāntare cāśaktiriti deśabhedādavirudve śaktayaśaktī tathaikatraiva kāryye kālabhedādapyavirudve
T11bsa0552u:386: yathāpūrvvaṃ nniḥkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sa eva paścāt sakriya iti cet /
T11bsa0552u:387: ucyate / na hi vayaṃ paribhāṣāmātrādekatra kāryye deśabhedādavirudve śaktyaśaktī brūmaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:397: ekasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanānnityatvasattvavadvā bhavediti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:398: tadatraikadharmmiṇi tat kālakāryyakāritvādhāre kālāntare tatkāryyākāritvasyānyakāryyakāritvasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanādvirodhaḥ
T11bsa0552u:399: tathā hi yatraiva dharmmiṇi tatkālakāryyakāritvamupalabdhanna tatraiva kālāntare tat kāryyākāritvamanyakāryyakāritvaṃ vā brahmaṇāpyupasaṃharttuṃ
T11bsa0552u:404: ata eva vajro 'pi pakṣakūkṣau nikṣiptaḥ kathamasau sphaṭiko varākaḥ kālabhedenābhedāsādhanāya dṛṣṭāntībhavitumarhati /
T11bsa0552u:405: na caivaṃ samānakālakāryyāṇāṃ deśabhede 'pi dharmmibhedo yukto bhedasādhakapramāṇābhāvādindriyapratyakṣeṇa nirastavibhramāśaṅkenābhedaprasādhanācca
T11bsa0552u:406: iti na kālabhede 'pi śaktyaśaktyorvirodhaḥ svasamayamātrādapahastayituṃ śakyaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:413: tathāhyupasapaṇapratyayena devadattakarapallavādinā sahacaro vījakṣaṇaḥ pūrvvasmādeva puñjāt samarthojāto 'napekṣa ādyātiśayasya janaka iṣyate
T11bsa0552u:414: tatra ca samānakuśūlajanmasu bahuṣu vijasantāneṣu kasmāt kiñcideva vījaṃ paramparayāṅkurotpādānuguṇamupajanayati bījakṣaṇānnānye vījakṣaṇā bhinnasantānāntaḥpātinaḥ
T11bsa0552u:415: nahyupasarpaṇapratyayāt prāgeva teṣāṃ samānāsamānasantānavarttināṃ vījakṣaṇānāṃ kaścit paramparātiśayaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:416: athopasarpaṇāt prāṅna tat santāna varttino 'pi janayanti paramparayāpyaṅkurotpādānuguṇaṃ vījakṣaṇaṃ vījamātrajananātteṣāṃ /
T11bsa0552u:418: hanta tarhi yadabhāve satyutpannopi na janayedeva /
T11bsa0552u:419: tathā kevalānāṃ vyabhicārasambhavādādyātiśayotpādamaṅkuraṃ vā prati kṣityādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣāṇāmevotpādakatvamakāmakenāpi svīkarttavyaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:423: api cāntyo vījakṣaṇo 'napekṣo 'ṅkurādikaṃ kurvvan yadi yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:426: tathā hi vījasyāṅkuraṃ pratyupādānatvaṃ kṣityādikaṃ tu prati sahakāritvaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:431: abhede vā kathaṃ vījasya na nānātvaṃ bhinnatādātmyāt /
T11bsa0552u:434: kśityādau janayitavye tadupādānam purvvameva kṣityādivījasya rūpāntaramiti /
T11bsa0552u:438: na ca kṣaṇasyopakārasambhavo 'nyatra jananāt tasyābhedyatvādityanekatvamapi nāstīti dvitīyo 'pi vyāpakābhāvo na sidvaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:440: yadi manyetānupakārakā api bhavanti sahakāriṇo 'pekṣaṇīyāśca kāryyeṇānuvihitabhāvābhāvāt sahakaraṇācca /
T11bsa0552u:442: kariṣyate ca kramavat sahakārivaśaḥ krameṇa kāryyāṇīti vyāpakānupalabdherasidveḥ /
T11bsa0552u:447: atha pūrvvāvasthitasyaiva vījādeḥ sahakāriṇā saha sambhūyakaraṇaṃ /
T11bsa0552u:454: atha tadvā tādṛgvā āsīditi na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:455: tatastādṛksvabhāvasambhavepyakaraṇaṃ sahakāriṇi nirapekṣatāṃ na kṣamata iti cet /
T11bsa0552u:458: sa cādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo na samānāsamānasantānavarttiṣu vījakṣaṇeṣu sarvveṣveva sambhavī kintu keṣucideva karmmakarakara pallavasahacareṣu /
T11bsa0552u:459: nanvekatra kṣetre niṣpattilabanādipūrvvakamānīyaikatra kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvvāṇyeva vījāni sādhāraṇarūpāṇyeva pratīyante,
T11bsa0552u:461: ucyate / kāraṇaṃ khalu sarvvatra kāryye dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭañca sarvvāstikaprasidvametat /
T11bsa0552u:463: tato bhavedapi kāraṇasāmagrīśaktibhedāttādṛśaḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ keṣāñcideva vījakṣaṇānāṃ yena taeva vījakṣaṇā ādyātiśayamaṅkurambā paramparayā janayeyu rnānye vījakṣaṇāḥ /
T11bsa0552u:470: pāṇisparśavataḥ kṣaṇasya na bhedabhinnānyakālakṣaṇādbhedo veti matadvaye mitibalaṃ yasyāstyasau jitvaraḥ /
T11bsa0552u:472: sāmagrī tu na sarvvathekṣaṇasahā kāryyantu mānānugamamiti //
T11bsa0552u:473: tadevaṃ nopakāro 'pekṣārtha ityanapekṣyaiva kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu nobhayavyāvṛttiḥ /
T11bsa0552u:475: tadā yadi pūrvvasthitasyeti viśeṣaṇāpekṣā tadā kṣaṇikasya naivaṃ kadācidityanapekṣaivākṣīṇā /
T11bsa0552u:480: yacca vījasyaikenaiva svabhāvena kārakatve kṣityādīnāmaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiranyathā kāraṇābhede 'pi kāryyabhede 'pi kāryyasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ tadasaṅgataṃ /
T11bsa0552u:484: yacca kāraṇābhede kāryyābheda ityuktaṃ tatra sāmagrīsvarūpaṃ kāraṇamabhipretaṃ sāmagrīsajātīyatve na kāryyavijātīyatetyarthaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:485: na punaḥ sāmagrīmadhyagatenaikenānekaṃ kāryyaṃ na karttavyaṃ nāma /
T11bsa0552u:488: na cendriyapratyakṣaṃ bhinnadeśaṃ sapratighaṃ dṛśyamarthadvayamekamevopalambhayatīti kvacidupalabdhaṃ yena tatrāpi bhedaśaṅkā syāt /
T11bsa0552u:493: tadetau dvāvapi vyāpakānupalambhāvasidvau na kṣaṇikāt sattvannivarttata iti nāyamasādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
T11bsa0552u:494: api ca vidyamāno bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoraniścitānvayavyatireko gandhavattādivadasādhāraṇo yuktaḥ /
T11bsa0552u:497: tadevaṃ śaktasya kṣepāyogāt samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ jananena vyāptamiti prasaṅgaviparyyayayoḥ sattve hetorapi nānaikāntikatvamataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviriti sthitam //
